title: 求大触帮忙
author: pca006132
txt_content:
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-9 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~6 ~-6" ~2 redstone_block"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~7 ~-5 ~3 command_block 0 replace {Command:"say 2"}"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~7 ~-4 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:"say 1"}"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~6 ~-3 ~3 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~2 ~ ~-1 redstone_block 0"}"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~6 ~-2 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~ ~ ~1 ~2 ~ ~1 stone 0"}"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~6 ~-1 ~1 ~6 ~-1 ~3 air"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~5 ~ ~ ~8 ~1 ~4 glass"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~5 ~ ~ ~8 ~ ~4 stone"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"say hi"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{

id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~11 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}

复制代码这个哪里有illegal use of \" 了?

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content: 看不出来，不如你把命令开头的\都去掉，然后把\"都改成'再试试看？？

replies.author: 小叶工作室
replies.txt_content: 最后一行多打了几个后括号
